translations: adj.如鸟的，像鸟一样的；多鸟的；（捕鸟的）猎犬的

sentences.sentence: Which makes them the cute little birdy version of Fleetwood Mac.
sentences.translation: 他们简直就是可爱的鸟版佛利伍麦克合唱团。

sentences.sentence: A friend of mine has been after me to watch "Birdy" for several months now.
sentences.translation: 我的一位朋友催我去看《鸟人》催了几个月了。

sentences.sentence: This provides an opportunity to exercise, take baths, play with toys and other forms of birdy entertainment.
sentences.translation: 这提供了机会行使，洗澡，玩玩具和其他形式的怪的娱乐。
